amendment.description: To state the policy of the United States on the intercontinental ballistic missile force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2448 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2448 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12506) To state the policy of the United States on the intercontinental ballistic missile force.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2448 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2448 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Conrad.
